Html:
I thought that it would be a nice thing to let you guys know that Project BHAL´s Messenger-Like application uses mostly Ascend Controls.
The project wiki is at http://bhal.pbwiki.com and the CodePlex site is http://www.codeplex.com/Wiki/View.aspx?ProjectName=BHAL

Thanks for such great controls.
Bernardo Heynemann
TFS Version Tree Browser Coordinator
BHAL Project Coordinator
WOM Project Coordinator

Cool and thank you.

I’ll let the others know and download and check it out.

Thanks,
Scorn
